pain.t.fx_2021

Class TabPain

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.control.Tab
      • pain.t.fx_2021.TabPain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class TabPain
extends javafx.scene.control.Tab

    Extends Tab to handle a modifiable canvas and auto-save timer

    Extension of Tab with variables for canvas data, file data, zoom data, undo data, and timer data. Methods deal with saving/updating canvas and timer.
    Since:
    2021-10-07
    See Also:
    ScrollPane

      Saves Canvas to a Temporary File Currently saves to Pain(t)FX_2021 Auto-save instanced to each Tab Called by BirthTimer

      • TabPain

        public TabPain()
        Constructor for Tab takes no arguments. Initializes blank canvas, ScrollPane, and timer. Calls birthTimer.

      • birthTimer

        public void birthTimer()
        Begins autoSave timer thread Do not call this function without killing previous timer. Is killed by exit functionality
        See Also:
